data.eml:eml: Primula dongchuanensis (Primulaceae), a new species from northern Yunnan, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wu, Zhi-Kun, Zhao, Fu-Wei, Chen, Jia-Hui, Huang, Yuan (2019): Primula dongchuanensis (Primulaceae), a new species from northern Yunnan, China. PhytoKeys 130: 171-181, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.130.35047, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.130.35047
